title: Increase test coverage from 15.19% to 30%
description:
## COMPLETED

**Original Goal:** Increase test coverage from 15.19% to 30%

**Actual Result:** Test coverage reached **57.65%** (line coverage), far exceeding the 30% goal.

### Coverage Report (from htmlcov):
- **Line coverage:** 57.65% (12,425 / 21,553 lines)
- **Branch coverage:** 45.03% (3,026 / 6,720 branches)  
- **Overall:** 54.65% (15,451 / 28,273)

This ticket was created based on an outdated coverage report. Significant test improvements have been made across all priority areas listed in the original ticket.
